title: has anyone got honor level 3 yet?
body:
i have been constantly getting honours every game and i don't seem to be leveling up? 
does it just take a long time for it to level{{champion:32}}  up?

replies.body: It will take some time, but stay consistent!  There's currently no meter to show how close you are, but it will come in time!
bullshit dude. nobody has r3 yet. your system is garbage
bet you dont get many honors
I have honour level 3.

With no meter and ridiculously slow progression, it defeats the entire purpose. What is different with this system from the last if everyone is perpetually on level 2? It's got even less personal feedback than the old system, at least with the old system you could see the numbers on your profile go up.
i have to concur. i prefer seeing my honors and having the ability to honor my opponents if they are worthy of it
Will this be more of a season grind to achieve higher honor ranks? Also will we need more honor for say from honor 3 to 4 or is it equal amount?
will there be a way to know when you're close to leveling up? or how well one is doing honor wise?
I get level 3 honor , but where is my frame???
see i think the honor system is crap. tell me my progress or it cant be real
If a tree falls down in the woods and nobody is there to hear it, did it ever fall at all?
Its the other way around lol. If a tree falls and nobody is around, did it even make a sound.
Whoops.
You can go to the spot in the woods where the tree is to see if it fell or not.. What you asked made no sense. I think you got the phrase wrong bud.

It's crap because there's only 3-4 more months left of the season and nobody has level 3. So that means nobody or only very few will get level 5 before it ends. It's also crap because players who don't play much will never get level 4 or even level 3
I have level 3.

Honestly im tempted to call bullshit on this honor system. Kinda just seems like a way for them to get people behaving better in-game and honouring eachother when we have good games, I cant say for later seasons but for now I dont think it does shit.
Since it resets every season, will anybody hit the highest rank, this season?
Where are you getting this info?  Last i heard they were still deciding whether to do a (possibly soft) reset each season or add more levels, etc
They just started giving it out finally
https://i.gyazo.com/ed367ed7921a59cce2e449bb37ecbb06.png - Honor level 3
i got honor level 3 today :D
I got it before like 5 hours :)
I have lvl 3, got it today.
